startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of Instagram URLs to scrape. Supported: Profiles, Posts, Reels, Locations, Hashtags.

search.title: Search Query
search.description: Enter a keyword to search on Instagram (e.g., 'tesla', 'nature'). The scraper will find top profiles/tags related to this.

searchLimit.title: Search Limit
searchLimit.description: Number of search results to process.

maxPostsPerProfile.title: Max Posts Per Profile
maxPostsPerProfile.description: Maximum number of posts to scrape for each profile. 0 for infinite.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: How many pages to scrape at once. Increase for speed, decrease if getting blocked.

scrapeComments.title: Scrape Comments?
scrapeComments.description: If enabled, comments will be scraped for each post.

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration
proxy.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler.

loginCookies.title: Login Cookies
loginCookies.description: Optional: Cookies to browse as a logged-in user. Helps with rate limits and private info. Export from your browser using an extension.

enhanceReport.title: Generate Visual Report
enhanceReport.description: If enabled, an HTML report with analytics will be generated.
